nodes.text: In capital ships used by the Galactic Empire and later the First Order, a command tower protruded from the dorsal superstructure. It held the starship's bridge.

Sat upon an Imperial-class Star Destroyers' command tower was either a tractor beam targeting array (Imperial I-class Star Destroyers) or a communications tower (Imperial II-class Star Destroyers and upgraded Imperial I-classes), which was flanked by two deflector shield generator globes.
